title: Curvy serif with thing ligatures?...
content:
Hi everyone. This is my first post on the site.

Can someone help me identify this typeface?

BTW, It's not Narsizz but pretty close to it.

Thanks in advance for the info.

JC

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whatfont_5704)
author: JuanCarlos

comments.content:
Love it/you!! thanks!

It's hard to tell from their site but the serifs on the lightest weight don't look as thin as they do on the sample, but it's definitely the one.

Much appreciated.

Heh. You're welcome (and welcome to Typophile)!  
I'm not sure, but might it be the Titling version? That has even more contrast (thinner thin bits).
